amendment.description: An amendment to require that none of the funds be obligated or expended for the development of an electronic health record except for a health record as set forth in the Joint Strategic Plan for Fiscal Years 2013-2015 of the Department of Veterans Affairs and Department of Defense, Joint Executive Council.
amendment.purpose: Amendment clarifies the intent of Congress with respect to the integrated electronic health records system as set forth in the Joint Strategic Plan for FY 2013-15 of the Department of Veterans Affairs and Department of Defense, Joint Executive Council.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Culberson amendment Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: Amendment agreed to Committee of the Whole
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Culberson amendment Agreed to by voice vote.
House amendment offered/reported by: Amendment (A007) offered by Mr. Culberson.
